title: Tipalt Burn
text: Tipalt Burn is a <a href="Burn%20%28landform%29">burn</a> which lies to the east of <a href="Greenhead%2C%20Northumberland">Greenhead, Northumberland</a>. The burn passes several historical sites such as <a href="Thirlwall%20Castle">Thirlwall Castle</a> and discharges into the <a href="River%20South%20Tyne">River South Tyne</a> near the village of <a href="Haltwhistle">Haltwhistle</a>. The burn is about in length and is located close to the north end of the <a href="Pennine%20Way">Pennine Way</a>.
